job.title: Senior C# Developer for Trading Application Development
job.description:
About Us:
Join our dynamic team at the forefront of financial technology and trading application development. We are committed to innovation, excellence, and pushing the boundaries of what's possible in trading technology.

Position: Senior C# Developer

Location: Remote

Employment Type: Full-time, Long-term

Role Overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior C# Developer to contribute to the development of our advanced trading application. This role involves crafting new features, resolving bugs, writing tests, and creating comprehensive documentation to support the application's growth and scalability.

Key Responsibilities:
-Design and develop .NET 8 applications using Prism and modular architecture.
-Implement and maintain WPF-based user interfaces with Telerik controls.
-Ensure adherence to best practices and quality code standards.
-Collaborate with the team to innovate and integrate new trading tools, addons, plugins, indicators, and strategies.

Required Experience & Skills (DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DONT HAVE THIS EXP & SKILLS !!!)
-Minimum 10 years of experience in C# application development.
-Proven expertise in .NET 8 applications, Prism, WPF, and Telerik controls.
-At least 5 years of experience and a deep understanding of trading, various markets (FX, equities, commodities, crypto), and financial instruments (spot, futures, options) 
-Demonstrated ability in developing trading tools, addons, plugins, indicators, strategies for C# based trading platforms like NinjaTrader.
-Familiarity with Bitbucket, Jira, GIT, and Slack.

Interview Process:
-Candidates must pass a comprehensive C# test, including multiple-choice questions, a coding exercise, and open-answer questions.
-Only apply if you meet the above criteria to ensure a productive process for both parties.

What We Offer:
-An opportunity to be part of a leading fintech project.
-A full-time and long-term commitment with the possibility to work over 40 hours per week.
-A collaborative and innovative work environment where your contributions make a difference.

Application Process:
To apply, please submit your resume, cover letter, and any relevant project portfolios or GitHub links that demonstrate your experience and suitability for the role.

We thank all applicants for their interest, but only those selected for an interview will be contacted.

NO AGENCIES !!!

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a talented Senior C# Developer with experience in trading application development to join our team for a project of more than 6 months. As a Senior C# Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our trading application, utilizing your expertise in MySQL, .NET Framework, Git, SQLite, and C#. 

Your main responsibilities include bug fixing, implementing new features, and ensuring the application's stability and performance. Additionally, you will be involved in desktop application testing, API integration, and collaborating with our team to meet project requirements.

To be considered for this role, please submit a proposal detailing how you can contribute to the project. We also encourage you to include links to any past completed projects that demonstrate your skills and expertise in trading application development.

We look forward to reviewing your proposal and discussing this exciting opportunity further.
